info.title: EZlion API Reference
info.summary: Retrieves information about Monster Hunter Frontier Z.
info.description: This API returns a list of objects or a single object depending on the endpoint. Each list includes metadata information, and in case of an error it returns the default value in the default key. All information comes from the game Monster Hunter Frontier Z.

200.description: A list of monsters in the results key. Includes metadata key.

400.description: Bad Request. Return application/problem+json. Returns default value in default key.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Return application/problem+json. Returns default value in default key.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the results to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

400.description: Bad Request. Return application/problem+json. Returns default value in default key.

404.description: Not Found. Return problem+json. Returns default value in default key.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Return application/problem+json. Returns default value in default key.
